PIN.values: |we have a 2nd text transform as the text needs to be unsized by the sliders|
|if you edit the positions you'll need to enable this as I've turned it off for performance|
|How High does the timeline come?&cr;&lf;todo get the height from the timeline&cr;&lf;|
|The plan is to have all the ioboxes resize to fit the screen pixels, and also based on how many rows and columns are needed as well|
